name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Proficient Software Developer with 13+ years of experience excelling in **Web Application Development**, specializing in **Python** for backend solutions and leveraging **Microservices** architectures to create scalable applications. Expert in deploying and managing containerized applications using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring high availability and performance.
Demonstrated ability to integrate **Relational Databases** as part of robust backend systems and orchestrate CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Jenkins** for seamless integration and delivery. Strong knowledge of real-time systems supported by messaging queues like **RabbitMQ**, and monitoring with **Prometheus**.
Versatile in developing high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial industries, with a strong focus on compliance-driven development aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Experienced in implementing cutting-edge AI/ML platforms that enable predictive analytics and real-time data processing, leveraging frameworks and tools such as **FastAPI** and **Django**.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** to develop web application solutions, reinforcing microservices architectures to enhance scalability and maintainability across diverse projects.
Designed and implemented microservices using **Docker** and **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, facilitating streamlined deployments and increased fault-tolerance for applications.
Incorporated best practices in **Web Application Development** to create full-stack platforms, aligning with industry standards for security and performance.
Managed and optimized **Relational Databases** including PostgreSQL, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval for high-traffic applications, with a focus on handling **9+ TB** of data.
Integrated CI/CD processes using **Jenkins** and GitHub Actions, automating build, testing, and deployment workflows, improving release efficiency by **30%**.
Implemented robust monitoring solutions with **Prometheus**, boosting application reliability and performance tracking for proactive maintenance.
Expressed code quality through automated testing frameworks like Jest and PyTest, achieving over **90% test coverage** across critical modules.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure that software aligns with user requirements and industry standards, improving user satisfaction metrics by **25%**.
Utilized **RabbitMQ** for handling asynchronous messaging, enabling efficient communication between microservices in real-time applications.
Led initiative for software documentation and technical specs, enhancing team onboarding and knowledge transfer, reducing ramp-up time for new developers by **15%**.

• Developed scalable **microservices** using **Python** and **Node.js** (NestJS/Express), improving system performance and supporting up to **1M** transactions per day.
• Engineered robust **web applications** with **React** (18) and **Vue 3**, incorporating **TypeScript** and enhancing user experience with responsive design elements from **Tailwind CSS**.
• Implemented real-time analytics dashboards using **React** and **D3.js**, enabling teams to visualize transaction data with batch processing efficiency metrics reaching **99%** uptime.
• Designed and executed an event-driven architecture leveraging **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, orchestrating over **10K** events daily across critical applications including payments and notifications.
• Created efficient ETL pipelines using **Python** and **Apache Airflow**, processing and integrating financial data from multiple sources with an accuracy of **95%**.
• Built and implemented **machine learning** models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, achieving detection rates of **90%** for suspicious transactions.
• Developed **ML pipelines** for real-time applications in credit scoring and transaction classification, using **MLflow** and **Airflow** to ensure seamless integration into backend services.
• Utilized **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and deployment, streamlining development workflows and enhancing system reliability.
• Engaged with **Jenkins** for continuous integration and deployment, reducing deployment times by **30%** while maintaining high standards of code quality.

- Developed robust microservices architectures using **Python** and **Django**, ensuring high performance and reliability for scalable web applications across **9** key modules.
- Led web application development by integrating **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and automated deployment, facilitating streamlined workflows across **6** development environments.
- Leveraged **RabbitMQ** for enhanced message queuing in the system, enabling asynchronous communication between services and improving overall system responsiveness.
- Designed relational database solutions utilizing both **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL**, achieving efficient data management and integrity for critical application components with a focus on reducing query response times by **30%**.
- Implemented continuous integration and delivery strategies using **Jenkins**, allowing for seamless code integration and faster deployment cycles.
- Monitored application performance with **Prometheus**, establishing alerts based on key performance metrics to maintain optimal user experience across the application.
- Collaborated in team efforts to develop APIs with **FastAPI**, enhancing service communication in a microservices context and optimizing response speeds for client requests by **25%**.
- Contributed to secure coding practices and vulnerability testing in adherence to security standards, maintaining compliance with **GDPR** guidelines to protect user data.
- Enhanced system observability through **Consul**, enabling service discovery and improved performance metrics monitoring across distributed services.
